channel.title: Homes on Be ambitious
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Be ambitious

item.description: Biography | 關於我 I am now working as an assistant professor in Aichi Medical University. Here is the home page of our department. I finished my MSc of Medical Statistics from the London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine in 2018 and PhD in Epidemiology from the Department of Public Health, Graduate School of Medicine, Nagoya University in 2016. You can find my cv here. I am capable of doing statistical analyses using a variety of softwares including STATA, SAS.

item.title: Presentations
item.description: 2019 The Annual Scientific Meeting of the Japane Epidemiological Association, Tokyo, Japan, 31$^{th}$ Jan, The day-time patterns of carbohydrate intake in the UK - results from the NDNS RP (2008-16), Poster P109. 2018 Project Talk of my MSc of Medical Statistics@LSHTM, London, 23$^{th}$ April, The timing of carbohydrates intake in the UK population, Oral, slides. Internal seminar webslides@AMU, Nagakute, 3$^{th}$ Oct, Basic survival analysis, oral, slides. Some slides about the year in LSHTM 2017-09/2018-09, slides.
